DOC.brief_summary: Patients with combined Anterolateral ligament (ALL) reconstruction- Anterior cruciate ligament (ACL) revision will have a better rotational knee stability and therefore better patient reported outcome measure (PROM) scores compared to patients, who have ACL revision surgery without ALL reconstruction.
DOC.brief_title: Reconstruction of the Anterolateral Ligament (ALL) With Revision Anterior Cruciate Ligament (ACL) Surgery
DOC.criteria: Patients with ACL revision surgery indication Patients with difficulties of understanding danish
